title: Which big music artists have never released greatest hits? - Quora

response.answer_text: An Australian collection “12 of the Best” compiling highlights of their first 4 Australian albums was due to be issued by ACDC’s record label but it was cancelled by Malcolm Young in favour of a live album just before release. Cassette copies (copy) exist and artwork for the album but it was never officially released. AC/DC have never released an official greatest hits collection in any format. The soundtrack to Iron Man 2 featured some greatest hits and other lesser known tracks as did the 1986 soundtrack to the Stephen King Movie Who Made Who but that seems to be as near as it’s got.
